xtc.lang.blink

Class NativeGDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtc.lang.blink.NativeGDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgentNativeDeclaration, NativeDebugger

    public class NativeGDB
extends Object
implements NativeDebugger, AgentNativeDeclaration
    GNU GDB implementation as the native debugger.
